website_summaries.verdict: This combination convection and microwave gives you the best of both worlds in one sleek looking system.
pros: This compact unit gives you the convenience of both a microwave and a convection oven without taking up a ton of space
It's easy to install and easy to use and customers like that the microwave can be replaced without replacing the whole unit
cons: The microwave and timer beep very loudly, while the convection oven's beep is very quiet and easy to miss

customer_reviews.title: INSTALLATION WAS A CHALLENGE
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very quick and the oven/microwave arrived in perfect condition. Installation was a bit of a challenge because of how the electric was routed through this unit as compared to the one we were replacing. This is no fault of the new unit, just the way it was for us. The look of this unit is great, and we love all of the features. It looks as though you can replace the microwave in the future if there are issues with it. With our old unit, we couldn't replace just the microwave. This one appears that you can. So far, so good. We like it!
customer_reviews.author: v357

customer_reviews.title: Free shipping and no taxes was even better! I love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I spent 3 months looking for a new wall oven/micro unit to replace my 34 year old Jen-Air. This was the cheapest price by far I could find. Free shipping and no taxes was even better! I love this unit! It's beautiful. Was pretty easy to install. I've read some reviews about the fan running for a long period of time after you turn the oven off, It doesn't seem to bother me.
customer_reviews.author: katie jeppe

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargin
customer_reviews.text: This sale went smoothly. Great communication and very quick ship for something this big. I had it in a week shipped to California. Shipping container protected it really well. Great bargin and I looked at several. Having all of the detailed installation and operation manuals availible on Amazon was very helpful. By the time it arrived everything was ready and by the end of the day it was installed and running. My wife just loves it. Huge amount of special features.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Melroy

customer_reviews.title: Very good Appliance for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good appliance for the price i paid. Lots of features for price. The reason i rated it four stars is because was i missing two screws that held the microwave to the oven.The microwave light is very dim, needs to brighter. I had to run my power cord through the top because my power plug was located at the top. After i got it installed i was very happy with the purchase.I like the idea that you can replace the microwave by removing the 4 screws at the bottom if needed.
customer_reviews.author: west4087

customer_reviews.title: lovely stove, just wish it cooked as well
customer_reviews.text: Lovely stove, looks great in the kitchen. Replaced a 21y/o Frigidaire Gallery convection oven with this one. This one the blower on the convection literally blows your breads, muffins and such so they cook with a windblown side bent look, the heat is uneven, the bottom of baked goods will burn while the top does not brown. We are trying to make do and learn this oven but it has been a trial. As this is one of Frigidaire's flagship line of appliances I certainly expected more. The microwave works like a standard microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a great price. We like the fact that the microwave can be removed and replaced if need be. We've only used the microwave so far, so can't comment on the oven. The microwave is very quiet. So far we're very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pbk

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I love the combination of the microwave and oven. It was easy to install. My previous oven was over 25 years old so I am still learning the features this one has to offer. The rack design and choice of levels is very helpful when preparing more than one dish. I would recommend this for a 27 inch space.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie 56

customer_reviews.title: even though what I am baking is not running over and it definitely smells like something is burning
customer_reviews.text: trying to contact seller, when using oven, I get fluid dripping from the oven, even though what I am baking is not running over and it definitely smells like something is burning. I cant clean the oven or shouldn't have each time I use it, I would like a response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: size i needed
customer_reviews.text: it fit just fine in the hole. was a replacement for a rental house... i guess so far so good.. have not heard back about any issues.
customer_reviews.author: george A hall

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks nicely. No issues with install
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks nicely. No issues with install. It is easier if you have 3 people if you want to self install. Two to pick it up -- this thing is heavy -- and one to feed the power line
customer_reviews.author: Ij

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This works very well . We love the combination . It has great features and looks very nice in our house . Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: stan pitts

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Both oven and microwave heat things up ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Both oven and microwave heat things up quickly. As others commented - the beeping of the timers will drive you nuts. I recommend getting a stand alone timer.
customer_reviews.author: John Mark Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Frigerdaire Oven and Microwave Set
customer_reviews.text: So far, very good oven-microwave set. Fit fairly well but needed to put a strip on bottom. Looks good now and like stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. In stores it costs up to $ 1000 more than the price for which you buy it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: astrid farina

customer_reviews.title: New kitchen New oven
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Love the many options and that it is also a convection oven. Who needs an air fryer. Have only had it a month so fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Great product. Double check your cabinet depth as I had to modify mine to make it work. All in all I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Great oven combo for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love it....easy install...extremely quite microwave...great price...only con is the finish tone is very low...5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: christopher thornton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item was as nice as advertised. Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful appliance. Only complaint is that the timer alert is too quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This looks and works well. A couple of problems ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks and works well. A couple of problems, however. Unlike what seems to be true from the photos and instructions, the microwave does not separate from the oven. This makes for more difficult installation. Second, the edges of the microwave face plates are plastic. A bit tacky.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Weare

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We like it very much, oven is perfect. Microwave door sometimes sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: microwave works great, havent tried oven yet but we've already receieved a bunch of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Skittles

customer_reviews.title: price different and parts may not be universal
customer_reviews.text: the power cord was too short, looking for one to replace it. we haven't used it yet. and then today 10/08 i see that the unit is on sale for 1899.99 after i just paid 2329.00 on 09/24 for it and haven't even used it yet. what gives
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sardenga

customer_reviews.title: which is good. The microwave functions as expected
customer_reviews.text: The first unit we had failed after 5 minutes of running the oven. The microwave portion kept working, but the oven died during the pre-heat cycle and totally powered off. The 2nd unit we received to replace the DOA unit had issues with the microwave door. It didn't open when you pressed the button. A service person came out and adjusted it, so it works OK now. Overall the alarm is quiet but it keeps beeping, which is good. The microwave functions as expected. The convection seems to cook baked goods well. Hopefully this unit can stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: JimJinny

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: Good so far! My old Sharp Microwave started having problems after 15 years of use- hated to part with it, and dislike hauling big boxes around stores and out to the car. I chose this model because of the price, reviews, and looks, plus the free Prime Shipping to my house. It looks nice, works great. It's small but all I use it for is heating up frozen meals, warming dinner plates and hot water for tea/coffee. I bought the smaller one, and it uses less power, which is a good thing. I live alone so there are no big meals to cook. Perfect for a single person. Hope this lasts as long as the last one did.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install great features
customer_reviews.text: This built in replaced out old one. We were concerned about features and ease of installation. After about 2 months of searching we came across this one. We are very happy with this replacement and would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: R Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Poor audiable alarm
customer_reviews.text: The Microwave works OK but the Audiable Alarm is so low you can't hear it above the sound of the microwave.Contacted Frigidaire and they told me the volume was not adjustable,very poor design,not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: riverman

product_meta.title: Frigidaire FGMC2765PF FGMC2765PF-Gallery 27" Stainless Steel Electric Combination Wall Oven-Convection
product_meta.description: Effortless Convection: Takes the guesswork out of convection cooking - our oven automatically adjusts standard baking temperatures to convection temperatures for consistent results. Quick Preheat: Preheat in just a few minutes. Fits-More Microwave Oven: Extra-large microwave provides 2. 0 cubic feet of cooking space. Smudge-Proof Stainless Steel: Resists fingerprints and cleans easily. Quick Clean: Quickly clean your oven in 2 hours with our quick self-clean cycle. One-Touch Options: Our ovens feature easy-to-use one touch buttons so you can cook pizza or chicken nuggets - or even add a minute to the timer - with the touch of a button. Built with American Pride: Designed, engineered and assembled in the U. S. A. Auto Oven Shut-Off: As an extra safety measure, the oven will automatically shut off after six hours.

specifications.Certification: ADA Compliant: NoAgency Approval: ULSabbath Mode
